Articles.Content:
ok, just another question as I have come back to this after a while and really I'm just curious to the reasons.

I used to have a ton of mods installed on the mac, all ran fine, and the mod manager said it installed around 450 patches, now running this on windows, with a lot less mods and its around 5,500!

is there a significant difference to the work load etc (64bit, win 10) it takes a lot longer to load, still runs well, just the long load time
This technical question about mod use has been moved to the technical questions about mod use subforum.
